p2p.storage
Interface DataItem

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DataItem, FileDataItem, IdentityDataItem, SimpleDataItem, SimpleDataItem, XMLFileDataItem, XMLIdentityDataItem, XMLSimpleDataItem, XMLSimpleDataItem
public interface DataItem
extends Comparable

Defines the operations that all data items stored on the network support.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
@author Roman Schmidt

Method Summary

          Get the item's content.

          Get the ID of the item.

          Get the key index of the item.
 Peer getPeer()
          Get the host responsible for this item.
 Type getType()
          Get the item's type of content.
 void setData(Object newData)
          Set the item's content.
